mapper.select: select * from t_course_order order by order_date desc limit #{start},#{pageSize};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_course_order (uuid,order_id,name,wechat_no,wechat_mark, qq_no,tel,course_name,course_price,order_date, update_datetime,remark) VALUES (UUID(), UUID(), #{name}, #{wechat_no},#{wechat_mark}, #{qq_no}, #{tel}, #{course_name}, #{course_price},#{order_date}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),#{remark});
